entry.title: Re 3. Readme: Submissions should include a readme that explains how and why the Streamr tech was used. In addition, it should point to the code snippe...
entry.summary: Re 3. Readme: Submissions should include a readme that explains how and why the Streamr tech was used. In addition, it should point to the code snippet where the Streamr tech got integrated.

entry.title: Re 2. Technical Implementation: The submission should demonstrate technical proficiency, including using Streamr Network's features effectively, such ...
entry.summary: Re 2. Technical Implementation: The submission should demonstrate technical proficiency, including using Streamr Network's features effectively, such as decentralized data streams and the streamr-client SDK (https://www.npmjs.com/package/streamr-client).

entry.title: Re 1. Innovation: Submissions should showcase a unique and innovative idea that addresses a real-world problem or solves an existing challenge.
entry.summary: Re 1. Innovation: Submissions should showcase a unique and innovative idea that addresses a real-world problem or solves an existing challenge.
